item.apotheosis.sigil_of_withdrawal.desc: Removes all socketed gems from an item
item.apotheosis.sigil_of_unnaming.desc: Removes the affixed name from an item
item.apotheosis.sigil_of_socketing.desc: Adds one socket to an item
item.apotheosis.sigil_of_rebirth.desc: Used to fuel the Reforging Table
item.apotheosis.sigil_of_enhancement.des: Used to fuel the Augmentation Table
block.apotheosis.augmenting_table.desc: Uses Sigils of Enhancement to augment individual affixes
